itemInfo.itemDesc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n- How to Obtain: It can be Produced at Serendia Shrine and Marie Cave. It can be also be obtained by Lumbering Pine Trees.

item.name: Yuria Staff
item.desc: A staff possessed with a hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Pine Timber Crate
item.desc: A Trade Item containing 10 planks of Pine Timber.

item.name: Noble Wagon Flag
item.desc:
A flag for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Noble Wagon Wheel
item.desc:
A wheel for a four-wheeled wagon.

- Can be Installed on: Four-Wheeled Wagon

It can be enhanced with a Black Stone (Armor).

item.name: Ultimate Yuria Staff
item.desc:
A Yuria staff at its maximum potential.
It has a low chance of being crafted when upgrading a Yuria staff.

- Restore Max Durability: Yuria Staff of Crimson Flame, Yuria Staff of Destruction, Yuria Staff of Temptation, Yuria Staff

item.name: Yuria Staff of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Yuria Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Staff of Temptation, Yuria Staff

item.name: Yuria Staff of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Yuria Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Staff of Destruction, Yuria Staff

item.name: Yuria Staff of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Yuria Staff.
It can be developed by Refining a common Yuria Staff.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Yuria Staff of Crimson Flame, Yuria Staff

item.name: Seleth Longbow
item.desc: A longbow possessed with a strong hatred for Humankind.

item.name: Seleth Longbow of Destruction
item.desc:
The energy of Destruction is contained within this Seleth Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Longbow of Destruction, Seleth Longbow

item.name: Seleth Longbow of Crimson Flame
item.desc:
The energy of Crimson Flame is contained within this Seleth Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Longbow of Crimson Flame, Seleth Longbow

item.name: Ultimate Seleth Longbow
item.desc:
A Seleth Longbow developed to its maximum potential.
There is a small chance this will be developed when Refining a common Seleth Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Longbow of Crimson Flame, Seleth Longbow of Destruction, Seleth Longbow of Temptation, Seleth Longbow

item.name: Seleth Longbow of Temptation
item.desc:
The energy of Temptation is contained within this Seleth Longbow.
It can be developed by Refining a common Seleth Longbow.

- Repair to Max. Durability: Seleth Longbow of Temptation, Seleth Longbow

item.name: Pine Plywood
item.desc:
A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.

- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Pine Timber. It requires the knowledge of Chopping: Beginner.

※ Find Lebyos in Heidel and complete the Working the Ash Tree Quest to obtain related knowledge.

※ In order to perform the Quest for Beginner Processing knowledge, achieve Gathering Level 14 or higher and visit Ficy in Heidel to complete the corresponding Quest. Refer to the Black Spirit Guide (/key) for detailed information.

item.name: Pine Plank
item.desc: A Processed natural resource obtained through Gathering and used as a material for Crafting. It can be modified using Alchemy or further Processing.\n\n- How to Obtain: It can be also be obtained by Chopping Pine Timber.
